materials.name: Zinc MOF material based on H3TBTC

synthesis_conditions.other_conditions: heating under an autogenous pressure, slowly cooled to room temperature at a constant rate of 0.04°C/min

materials.name: MOF thin film

synthesis_conditions.equipment: Electrolysis setup with Zn plate anode
synthesis_conditions.other_conditions: Electrolysis started, Zn2+ ions produced via anodic oxidation, TBTC3- anions moved to anode driven by electric field, self-assembly of Zn2+ and TBTC3- occurred resulting in deposition of the thin film

materials.yield: MOF thin film deposited onto anodic Zn plate
